message: Weather update - a cold front from Cuba that could pass over Haiti
original: Un front froid se retrouve sur Cuba ce matin. Il pourrait traverser Haiti demain. Des averses de pluie isolee sont encore prevues sur notre region ce soi

message: Is the Hurricane over or is it not over
original: Cyclone nan fini osinon li pa fini

message: Looking for someone but no name
original: Patnm, di Maryani relem pou li banm nouvel li ak timoun yo. Mesi se john jean depi Monben kwochi.

message: UN reports Leogane 80-90 destroyed. Only Hospital St. Croix functioning. Needs supplies desperately.
original: UN reports Leogane 80-90 destroyed. Only Hospital St. Croix functioning. Needs supplies desperately.

message: says: west side of Haiti, rest of the country today and tonight
original: facade ouest d Haiti et le reste du pays aujourd hui et ce soir

message: Information about the National Palace-
original: Informtion au nivaux palais nationl

message: Storm at sacred heart of jesus
original: Cyclone Coeur sacr de jesus

message: Please, we need tents and water. We are in Silo, Thank you!
original: Tanpri nou bezwen tant avek dlo nou zon silo mesi.

message: I would like to receive the messages, thank you
original: Mwen ta renmen jouin messag yo. Merci

message: I am in Croix-des-Bouquets. We have health issues. They ( workers ) are in Santo 15. ( an area in Croix-des-Bouquets )
original: Nou kwadebouke, nou gen pwoblem sant m yo nan santo 15

message: There's nothing to eat and water, we starving and thirsty.
original: Bon repo pa gen anyen menm grangou swaf

message: I am in Petionville. I need more information regarding 4636
original: M nan pv mvle plis enfomasyon sou 4636

message: I am in Thomassin number 32, in the area named Pyron. I would like to have some water. Thank God we are fine, but we desperately need water. Thanks
original: Mwen thomassin 32 nan pyron mwen ta renmen jwen yon ti dlo gras a dieu bo lakay mwen anfom se sel dlo nou bezwen

message: Let's do it together, need food in Delma 75, in didine area
original: Ann fel ansanm bezwen manje nan delma 75 nan riyel didine

message: More information on the 4636 number in order for me to participate. ( To see if I can use it )
original: gen plis enfomasyon sou 4636 la pom w sim ap ka patisipe.

message: A Comitee in Delmas 19, Rue ( street ) Janvier, Impasse Charite #2. We have about 500 people in a temporary shelter and we are in dire need of Water, Food, Medications, Tents and Clothes. Please stop by and see us.
original: Komite katye delma 19 rue janvier imp charite no 2. Nou genyen 500 moun ki nan abri pwovizwa. Nou bezwen dlo, manje, medikaman, tant, vtman. Tanpri vizite n.

message: We need food and water in Klecin 12. We are dying of hunger. Impasse Chretien Klecin 12 extended ( extension ) We are hungry and sick.
original: Nou bezwen mange avek dlo nan klcin 12 LA LAFIN AP TU NOU IMPASSE chrtien klcin 12 pwolonge nou gwangou nou malad

message: are you going to call me or do you want me to call ou? let me know?
original: Eske se rele nap relem oubyen se mwen kap rele nou?si se mwen eske

message: I don't understand how to use this thing 4636.
original: Mwen pa konprann koman pou m itilize bagay 4636 la

message: I would like to know if the earthquake is over. Thanks
original: Mwen ta remen connin si trenblem de terre afini oke

message: I would like to know if one of the radio ginen Journalist died?
original: Mwen ta renmen konnen eske ge jounalis radyo ginen ki mouri.

message: I'm in Laplaine, I am a victim
original: Mwen laplan mwen viktim kot yap bay d pou latranbl

message: There's a lack of water in Moleya, please informed them for me.
original: Nan moleya pa gen dlo svp f konnen sa pou mwen.

message: Those people who live at Sibert need food they are hungry.
original: nou menm nan sibert nou grangou nou bezwen mange

message: I want to say hello, my message is to let you know that there's an area in faustin Anhy street that has nothing neither food, water and medicine,
original: Mwen salye nou dab mesaj mwen an se jis nou gen yen faustin 1re rue anhy 1re kipa jwenn an yen ni vizit ni dlo e moun yo dan le bezyon yap achte ti sa

message: Can you tell me about this service
original: Can you tell me about this service

message: People I'm at Delma 2, we don't anything what so ever, please provide us with some food, water, and medicine
original: MEZANMI MWEN MWEN NAN DELMA 2 NOU TR MAN MAL NOU PA JAN M JWEN ANY

message: We are at Gressier we needs assistance right away. ASAP, Come help us.
original: Se gressier nou an difikilte tanpri vin ede nou

message: How can we get water and food in Fontamara 43 cite Tinante?
original: Comment nou ka jwen dlo ak manje nan font 43 cite tinante

message: We need help. Carrefour has been forgotten completely. The foul odor is killing us. Just letting you know. Thanks!!
original: Nap di secours yo bliye kafou net sant m ap touye moun fe mesage la pase ok mersi.

message: Good evening, Radio one please. I would like information on Tiyous.
original: Bonswa radio one svp eskew pap k enfomasyon sou tiyous.

message: We have a lot of problem at Delma 75 Avenue Albert Jode, those people need water and food.
original: We have a many probleme a baout delmas 75 aveny albert jode the pepole need some weater some food and medcin Iwat my name rejinald

message: I'm here, I didn't find the person that I needed to send the pant by phone
original: Mwen la moun poum te voye pantalon mwen pa jwenn yo pa telefon

message: People have been sleeping outdoors in a field near Lilavois since 12 Jan. No coords on Lilavois but apparently it is near PaP
original: ofit des habitants qui dorment a la belle etoile sur le terrain de Lilavois depuis le 12 janvier.

message: We want you to know that Carrefour need help, we starving to death.
original: koufou poko jwenn ankenn ed nap mouri grangou men nou gen dlo ok.

message: How we can find food and water? we have people in many differents needs, and also for medicine at Fontamara 43 cite Tinante.
original: Comment nou ka jwen dlo ak manje nou gen moun ki gen tout kalte pwoblem nan fontamara 43 cite tinante

message: Delmas 33 in Silo, need water.
original: Delma 33 silo gen problem dlo

message: I would like to get help at Cote Plage in Carrefour
original: Mwen ta renmen yo vizite cote plage carrefour

message: I am in Leoganes, where can I get food? Please
original: mwen leyogan ki kote ki gen manje tanpri

message: The Comite Miracle in the area of Alerte Rue Monseigneur Guilloux, ( Streets, Alerte and the cross street is Mgr Guilloux ) would like to urgently receive food, water and tents for the people in that area. Thanks
original: komite mirak ki tabli nan zone alerte mgr guilloux ta renmen resevwa prese prese dlo manje ak tant pou moun nan zone nan
